name: Gift for You
description:
What is "Gift for You"?
This is a puzzle action game with 25 stages.
The goal of the game is to advance through the stages and reach the goal by manipulating the blocks with 【Move】,【Jump】,【Attack】.


Various gimmicks
To clear a stage, you need to make full use of blocks with various effects.

(Example.)
Blocks that move when attacked
Blocks that make the player jump up when placed on them
Blocks that ascend and descend on a special floor
etc.


Equipped with a ranking function
The result screen when the game is cleared shows the time it took to clear the game.
If you beat your own best time, the record displayed on the title screen will be overwritten.

Beat your best time and aim for a higher ranking in the Steam ranking.
